results.message: authentication bypass detected: endpoint accessible without authentication (status: 200)

header security issues detected: Missing recommended security header: X-Content-Type-Options (recommended value: nosniff); Missing recommended security header: X-Frame-Options (recommended value: DENY or SAMEORIGIN); Missing recommended security header: X-XSS-Protection (recommended value: 1; mode=block); Missing recommended security header: Strict-Transport-Security (recommended value: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains); Missing recommended security header: Content-Security-Policy (recommended value: policy directives); Insecure information disclosure header: Server (gunicorn/19.9.0); Insecure CORS policy: Access-Control-Allow-Origin set to wildcard (*)
